WorkItem.Description:
I am newbie in C#. When I trying to use NetOffice i got the following problem. Please be kind enough to solve this one for me.

Already I added the relevant dlls to the project. But I couldn't initialize. When I trying like this.

Outlook.Application outlookApplication = new Outlook.Application();  

it shows me a error like this.

** Interop type 'NetOffice.OutlookApi.Application' cannot be embedded. Use the applicable interface instead.

WorkItem.PlainDescription:
I am newbie in C#. When I trying to use NetOffice i got the following problem. Please be kind enough to solve this one for me.

Already I added the relevant dlls to the project. But I couldn't initialize. When I trying like this.

Comments.Message:
set the reference properties "Embed Interop Types" to false

Sebastian
Thank you very much Sebastian. I solved my issue. You did a great job by creating this kind of wrapper to solve the version dependency in office applications.....
